name: Group extensions for SIS school groups

attributes.name: startDate
attributes.description: Start date (ISO8601 format, e.g. "2016-10-15") for this enrolment.

attributes.name: endDate
attributes.description: End date (ISO8601 format, e.g. "2016-10-15") for this enrolment.

attributes.name: parentGroup
attributes.description: The parent group in a group hierarchy.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the parent Group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the corresponding 'Group' resource.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the type of resource, e.g., 'SchoolUnit' or 'Group'.
